feed.title: OpenSign Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features: - Introduced a "Save as Template" option available across all document reports. - Added informative notes and update review UI on success page. - Removed the region tab, white-label app name, and OpenSign documentation help for enterprise users.

Bug Fixes: - Ensured emails are stored in lowercase in the create contact API. - Resolved an undefined placeholder error when creating a document from a template via the API.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.15.0...v2.16.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.17.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features: * 'Note' variable can now be used in resend mail template. * 'TemplateId' is now associated with new Document when its created from template. Its returned in the getDocument API. * Allow changing Document name when a document is created from Template.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.15.0...v2.17.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features: - Added support to recreate a new document from declined document without having to redo everything from scratch. - Added replace pdf file feature for Templates. PDF underlying a Template can now be replaced while keeping all the fields the same. - Introduced the ability to replace pdf file for in UpdateTemplate and CreateDocumentfromtemplate API. - Revamped the preferences menu UI.

Bug Fixes: - Fixed issue with capital letters in contact emails via API. - Better validations & error handling in APIs

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.16.0...v2.18.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.19.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features: - Add 2 factor authentication support - Add passkeys login support - Add search option in drive - Add LTV enabled signatures BETA toggle in preferences menu - Saved email template support for resend-email functionality.

Bug Fixes: - Issue with capital letters in email when user signs up with google or SSO. - Issue with user creation from admin when user already existed in contactbook. - Update dependencies

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.18.0...v2.19.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.19.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes: - Permission denied for action addField on class _User

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.19.0...v2.19.1
